This Onboarding Guide is structured as follows:

|  |  |
| --- | :--- |
| **Section** | **Content** |

| Getting Started with Run:ai | Introduction to Run:ai concepts and fundamentals |

| Tutorials | Practical examples and demonstrations of different use cases |
